issue.title: [Archery] Cleanup integration module to use companion classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6816](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6816). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a followup ticket to ARROW-6466.


 \* Replace print calls with utils.logger
 \* Use ArrowSources instead of ARROW_HOME
 \* Use utils.Command and utils.CMakeBuild where possible
